column4: hallo, i installed ubuntu 10.04 and i have a problem . when i go to read a .txt file which is writted in greek i see some very weird letters which are definetely not greek ... please someone help me ... this is an example http://news.in.gr/files/1/2010/AEI-Hmerisia-90.TXT
but the same happens when i download another txt file
Seems to me you have Cyrillic fonts and not Greek fonts
